table.name: vtiger_solaryblockalert
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solaryblockalert` ( `solaryblockalertid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `solaryblockalert` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` DECIMAL(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `maxpoint` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `type_block_solary` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `type_block_amount` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `type_application` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`solaryblockalertid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_solaryblockalertcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_solaryblockalertcf` ( `vtiger_solaryblockalertcf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_solaryblockalertcf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
